title: Twitch is a ranged aoe rengar.
body: We gave rengar so much shit for having little counterplay when he suicide dives every fight hoping for a kill before he goes down, yet twitch can do the same thing except from 850 range and to multiple people at once.

replies.body: Twitch is one hell of a champion to deal with, and I can definitely see where his strengths are. I just wanted to step in and encourage you guys to give this post a read, [**Before you make a post about balance...**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/jLGvQ3Wk-before-you-make-a-post-about-balance), before commenting. As much as I love reading quality memes, this is the Gameplay sub-board and discussion should adhere to the guidelines here. Thanks, fams!

It's not at all a meme post, Twitch comes out of stealth and deletes champions by right clicking them. This is exactly what Rengar was doing pre rework and Twitch is just as disgusting as he was.

As for the balance side of this Twitch is rated no2 amongst all champions behind only Janna according to lolalytics, I can't imagine any argument for him as a balanced champion right now.
at this point, balance has become a meme

> [{quoted}](name=LankPants,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xdkmy6UN,comment-id=001b0000,timestamp=2017-08-18T07:03:34.446+0000)
>
> It's not at all a meme post, Twitch comes out of stealth and deletes champions by right clicking them. This is exactly what Rengar was doing pre rework and Twitch is just as disgusting as he was.
> 
> As for the balance side of this Twitch is rated no2 amongst all champions behind only Janna according to lolalytics, I can't imagine any argument for him as a balanced champion right now.

"Memes" was in reference to multiple comments within this thread.

Mmh, I'm still laughing at the fact that Evelynn got insta gutted every time she was around a 50% winrate whereas Twitch has been broken for... like 9 months now?  
And Eve is melee and weak as fuck lategame lmao.

I guess he'll get nerfed once they sell enough omega squad skins.

> [{quoted}](name=zImaginaerum,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xdkmy6UN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-08-17T16:12:17.350+0000)
>
> Mmh, I'm still laughing at the fact that Evelynn got insta gutted every time she was around a 50% winrate whereas Twitch has been broken for... like 9 months now?  
> And Eve is melee and weak as fuck lategame lmao.
> 
> I guess he'll get nerfed once they sell enough omega squad skins.

Twitch has a horrendous early game tho.
No he doesn't. Maybe used to.
His early is trash what are you talking?

his early MIGHT be trash . . .if his Es base damage at level 1 wasn't so hilarious

"oh but he has to stack it" do you know that adcs near instantly try to kill each other at level 2 like god damn clockwork? and at level 2 twitch has MORE then enough time to get the full stacks to chunk you with his E . . . which will win most 1v1 and in bot lanes case 2v2's
Just because the other ADC is an idiot doesn't mean that he's broken. If you constantly try to fight the fed assassin 1v1, is the assassin broken?
If there was nothing you can do about it because the fed assassin has limited counterplay, yea.

If he's fed if you braindeadedly run at him?

If he has no counterplay, he is. But just because people are too stupid to fight them right doesn't mean he's busted.

That doesn't imply braindeadedly running into them.

The issue is how braindeadedly they can run after you with or without flash, implying you're a) dead or b) fight and still dead, no options.

Not much I can do about a 3 item 0/0/0 twitch 3 shotting half the team, that's kinda my ass without being able to stop it. Being fed makes that even more hell.

> [{quoted}](name=Sexy Bisex Plant,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xdkmy6UN,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2017-08-17T16:26:36.610+0000)
>
> No he doesn't. Maybe used to.

I used to main him (before Lethality was introduced, stopped when it was) I still play him occasionally but his early game is still questionable af

His early is decent although he gets shit on by mf, draven, varus, and lucian, kalista, ezreal, and jhin. His midgame sucks tho. At that point he doesn't have enough items to deal meaningful damage and just gets popped.
well his early is horrendous into certain matchups, but having the right support and playing safely can fix that.
Because Evelynn's ganks are extremely obnoxious and effective.

I understand it. But... 1) her early clear sucks, if your jungler is decent she won't be able to be so effective because he can just camp-kill her early and get free gold; 2) her damage isn't that high before she gets items; 3) she falls off super hard; 4) smart warding vs stealth junglers as a midlaner kinda fucks them up.

Eve's level 3 clear is actually really good. 

Seriously, just spam Q on raptors with talisman and you walk out as if you used a pot. Q wolves as you run past them to blue and you heal for free, smite blue and you're almost full health. If you know how to kite camps with Q and talisman she's one of the healthier clears in the jungle. 

Camping and killing an eve early? If an eve is gettng counter jungled then they clearly don't play eve right since she's supposed to be spam ganking early and/or counter jungling herself. I used to main her before the announced rework and I honestly can't figure out why people consider her a hard champion, she's so binary and easy to snowball crazy in the first 3 minutes as. I've never been counter jungled as eve.. hell I don't even remember getting counter ganked because I usually cleared stupid fast and walked out level 3 full and get FB before they finish their 2nd buff.

I think one of the main difference is yes his one for one trade but also Rengar ult also has a loud sound that also makes your screen dark on the edge so that way you know he's coming, Twitch on the other hand just suddenly shows up and fucks shit up.

I still think it was a stupid decision to buff twitch's stealth duration back in the assassin update. Why the fuck can twitch be invisible longer than shaco or even wukong while having range.. before the stealth update it wasn't so bad because at least the stealth didn't let him go from invis tier 2 towers, to ganking half way into the lane in between tier 1 towers

> I still think it was a stupid decision to buff twitch's stealth duration back in the assassin update. Why the fuck can twitch be invisible longer than shaco or even wukong while having range.. 

Not that I would be trying to say it is fair, but you do realize Wu and Shaco have **Invisibility** while Twitch has **Camouflage**? Yes, the duration may be sick, but still comparing no wind-up immediate invisibility with slightly delayed (and interruptable as far as I know) camouflage...

Yea, but regardless twitch's stealth is way too long, and the thing about twitch is while yes, he can be seen, he's ranged so unless he tries to grab your butt, you're not practically going to see him going around and ulting the entire team. Where as a wu or a shaco you see the clone or the "poof" warning you. Camo is good, don't get me wrong, but it works for eve or rengar where if you see them maybe you can stun or flash away in advance, with twitch he's going to pop out out of his reveal zone so the stealth indicator doesn't achieve much. Am I suggesting turn him invis? No, that would make the issue worse, but his camo either needs a bigger warning radius to make up for range or a shorter duration so like wu or shaco, you can see him preping in advance.

What I'm comparing is, twitch is safe enough with his camo to the point you don't get a camo warning and it might as well be invis, and because of its longer duration, he can prep it a far distance away unlike wu or shaco that makes seeing it coming in the first place even harder.

> but his camo either needs a bigger warning radius to make up for range

With this I agree, that would be probably best solution.

Just implement a warning system like Rengar. If you are within 1000 (Ult range is 850) units of him while he's in camo, you get some sort of warning there's a Twitch nearby. I've seen suggestions to make it relate to his noxious odor, but the point is that he wouldn't catch people completely flat footed but he would still be able to flank, and with his speed boost he should still be able to catch people out.
Which is pretty ironic, since Rengar is the silent experienced killer while Twitch smells as fuck.
don't forget that twitch is rightclicking while rengar had a combo to do
Doesn't matter. Skill isn't a balance point nor should be.
I hope you are joking.
Yet no one has problems with Vayne, Cait (used to) or Draven dealing stupid amounts.

Vayne is fundamentally broken she will NEVER be balanced unless reworked.

Cait numbers were broken

Draven litterally runs down on your post lane phase and he is predictable.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xdkmy6UN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-08-17T15:49:03.361+0000)
>
> Yet no one has problems with Vayne, Cait (used to) or Draven dealing stupid amounts.

They are still broken. Draven does almost twice the normal adc damage at early levels, meaning he can zone you off cs. Cait still holds you hostage under your tower with her trap line. Vayne still is vayne.

> [{quoted}](name=Dasdi96,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xdkmy6UN,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2017-08-17T15:56:14.474+0000)
>
> They are still broken. Draven does almost twice the normal adc damage at early levels, meaning he can zone you off cs. Cait still holds you hostage under your tower with her trap line. Vayne still is vayne.

Vayne, the satanic bitch, idk why people say she's hard to play, just get silver bolts and watch your opposition rage quit 1 by 1

Because the majority of the ADCs can just bully her alot early game.
And most of the meta ADCs at a given time are almost always great picks into her.

Which in return makes her hard to play due to matchups and poor laning phase.
This is also not even accounting for her short range.

Look, Vayne is really strong in the right hands, and her damage + outplay potential thanks to the invisibility can be obnoxious at time.
But while this is true, she is also more mechanically challenging than most other ADCs as she has to get in close and constatly kite and have good target prioritization.
Why do you think 'Vaynespotting' even came to exist? Because playing Vayne put you in that position.
It's hard to do things like run into 5 enemies on Cait considering you're standing miles farther back than Vayne does (for example).

She also brings close to nothing else for her team other than damage.
Other ADCs have utility, longer range, sieging potential, tower taking, objective control, etc etc. 
Which just makes their work easier as they have something they excel at or can offer other than just damage and trying to assassinate people when if ahead or managed to scale.
no twitch is balance twitch is mechanics.

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xdkmy6UN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-17T15:42:16.406+0000)
>
> no twitch is balance twitch is mechanics.

Press R right click mechanics? Nice.
Pretty sure he was being sarcastic lol
This is Gameplay, it's dangerous to be sarcastic here. That's Memelogy 101.
you are new to the boards? all older member know me that i hate adc role in general lmfao.

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Xdkmy6UN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-17T15:42:16.406+0000)
>
> no twitch is balance twitch is mechanics.

Why is this comment downvoted, lol? It's like no one understands a joke anymore.

u dont fucking joke on the gameplay boards. this shit is serious.




/s
Twitch was intended to be a nightmare late-game, that's how hyper carries work
Rengar is supposed to be an assassin. What's your point?

I mean he doesn't have a dash, a snare, or a cleanse.

Not that Twitch isn't an obnoxious little shit, but Rengar is more than burst and stealth.
What kind of arguement is that? Twitch has also has things that Rengar doesn't, such as ranged autos, DoT, AoE autos and attack speed increase. What's your point?

I think they should add sewers to SR and allow twtich to use the access points to roam and just remove the camouflage. Then they should also add cheese and sandwiches that spawn close to the sewer entrances that he has to collect to get his full power. (like a Bard ADC) xD

Nope. Their play patterns are quite different.

Rengar deletes one squishy target from stealth before they can react and hopes he can either escape or continue killing. He has moderate durability/CC.

Twitch uses stealth to position such that the enemies can't kill him before he melts them all, and he hopes to god it works because he's a glass cannon with dogshit for CC.

Just because both have stealth and damage doesn't make them the same for fucks sake.

By that token, Evelynn is a moving melee Teemo.

Twitch can't hide away in the jungle and farm up.

Pretty sure Twitch needs more items than Rengar did when he was really busted.

Twitch's steal is way worse than Rengar's, making it way harder to pick a specific target.
... What? Twitch jungle is played specifically so he can farm up and melt the enemy team.
